data.title: Finalist of Taiwan Presidential Hackathon
data.content: Selected as one of the 7 global finalists in the international track of the prestigious Presidential Hackathon, hosted by the Taiwan government, with a primary focus on UN sustainability goals.

data.title: Winner of Script4her Hackathon
data.content: Awarded a total prize of Rs. 1 Lakh in a nationwide hackathon organized by Dhriiti and Impact Hub Manila, in collaboration with Project Her & Now of GIZ, Villgro, Nasscom Foundation, and NuSocia.

data.title: Runner-up at Electhon Hackathon
data.content: Won a cash prize of 50k for being the runner-up in a hackathon organized by the Election Commission of India, aimed at addressing critical issues in the electoral process.

data.title: Honorary mention at Karnataka Police Hackathon
data.content: Bagged an honorary mention and a cash prize of 10k in a hackathon organized by the Karnataka State Police, aimed at curbing crime by brainstorming solutions with the help of state-of-the-art technologies.

data.title: Finalist of SIH 2022 Hackathon
data.content: Finalist for the problem statement 'Digitalization of the application process for sports infrastructure' under the Khelo India Scheme by the Department of Sports (DoS), Ministry of Youth Affairs & Sports.

data.title: Development Team - SIH 2022 Portal
data.content: Contributed to the development of the Smart India Hackathon 2022 portal, a platform for India's largest hackathon. Our efforts were recognized by the Ministry of Education's Innovation Cell for delivering a robust digital solution.
